GRISLY.Definition: very unpleasant, shocking, and involving death

TRAMS.Definition: city trains that run on tracks in the street

FLASHING.Definition: turning on and off very quickly

SEA CHANGE.Definition: a very big and complete change

FLASHY.Definition: very bright and designed to attract attention

DIVERSIFYING.Definition: making it less dependent on it

PUMPING.Definition: producing or getting large amounts continuously

BUZZWORDS.Definition: fashionable words used to sound impressive

CENTREPIECE.Definition: the most important or main part

EXCEPTIONS.Definition: cases that do not follow the usual rule

GRAVITY.Definition: the force that pulls things towards the ground

STACKED.Definition: placed on top of each other

CLICHE.Definition: an idea used so often it feels boring

AMBITIOUS.Definition: wanting to achieve something very big or difficult

CORAL REEFS.Definition: underwater rock-like structures made by sea animals

BLANK SLATE.Definition: a place with no past development

BAGGAGE.Definition: problems or difficulties from the past

EMPOWERED.Definition: given power and ability to act

PIONEERING.Definition: completely new and never done before

FLUFF.Definition: empty words with little real meaning

VANITY PROJECT.Definition: a project done mainly to look impressive

LEAKAGE.Definition: money leaving the country instead of staying

LOGISTICS.Definition: planning how things are moved and organised

BLANK CANVAS.Definition: a chance to create something new

GRAPHICS.Definition: visual images used to explain ideas

DISTORT.Definition: change in a harmful or unnatural way

FOUNDATIONS.Definition: the underground base of the buildings

FACADE.Definition: the outside front of the buildings

NOMADIC TRIBES.Definition: groups of people who moved and did not settle

PETRO STATE.Definition: a country rich because of oil

GLOSSY.Definition: shiny and designed to look attractive

DRONE SHOTS.Definition: videos filmed from drones in the air

DIVERTED.Definition: moved away from the original use

TIMING.Definition: when it was supposed to happen

VESTED INTEREST.Definition: a personal reason to want it to continue

RETHINKING.Definition: thinking again in a new way

BALANCE ITS BUDGET.Definition: make the amount of money spent

HAD TO GIVE.Definition: needed to be cut or stopped

THEORETICALLY.Definition: in idea, but maybe not in reality

RUSTING.Definition: slowly being destroyed by air and water

STEEL.Definition: a strong metal used in building
